name: KLOV Forums Anti-Retina burn theme
description: Several members of the arcade-museum.com forum have complained about the bright theme. I found a theme, Offtopicz - Dark By Neflhiem here on userstyles.org and modified it to work with the KLOV forum. I have removed the CSS that referenced all of his custom images that were not displaying. This is a theme for Vbulletin 3.5.
